design projects

Legal e-dictionary logo

about

The legal e-dictionary was created by The Institute of State and Law with the cooperation with Natural Language Processing Centre at Faculty of Informatics Masaryk University. It is focused on students and law enthusiast, therefore, the web pages along with its logo were designed to catch the eye.

developed for

The Institute of State and Law

contribution

design, front-end

technologies used
